author: Erika Alexander
text:
We will not “get over it.” We will not give up reparative justice for descendants of enslaved African Americans. I’ll say it again and again! Reparations Now! 

#abolitionism #3rdreconstruction #reparations #RevoltSummit

author: Bishop Talbert Swan
text:
Biden is meeting with Zelenskyy today. 

He’s been making it rain on Ukraine to the tune of $60 BILLION.

Meanwhile, he won’t even discuss reparations for Black Americans.

author: FirstRepair
text: Watch 'The Big Payback,' a documentary on Evanston's Road to Reparations starting January 16th. Available on the PBS App, http://to.pbs.org/3hvTy5d. #ReparationsNow

author: Jay Davis
text:
Now I see why they're trying to erase Martin Luther King Jr. (One of the most influential Foundational Black American heroes) from U.S. History textbooks in these school districts. 

They don't want people to know the real Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. #ReparationsNow #Reparations

author: J Brisenio
text: 85% of white "allies" whenever #Reparations are mentioned.

author: Don Salmon
text: Want to get reparation for their descendent?. and the other their descendants, still fighting for reparation. Never forget the struggle for reparations for African-Americans. Blacks in the diaspora continue.#BlackTwitter.#PanAfrican .

author: Sab
text:
After 24 years, the government of KS (Albin Kurti), for the first time, demands equal rights for Albanians living in Serbia, War reparations...
Vucic is shocked, and he should be. The previous Gov promised him the north and amnisti.

author: Iysis Awoke
text: We don't need to fight immigrants to make our case for reparations. All we need is evident in our history. Been trynna tell ppl this for years.

author: Dr. Joel Brown FRSA
text:
You enslaved no one.
You owe no one racial reparations. 

Be free from any such projected guilt, shame responsibility for the sins of anyone else in history.

author: Dylan Burns
text:
No good excuse for this

Seizing the assets of Russian oligarchs to help rebuild Ukraine is the closest we will most likely get to reparations for this horrific invasion, at least for the immediate future. I expected more out of the squad.

author: Brooke Goldstein
text: Between 1948-1972 almost a million Jews indigenous to the Middle East were expelled or forced out of their homes by racist antisemitic Arab rulers. Even prior to 48, Jews faced horrific persecution. To this day no reparations have been made. This is the story of the Jews of MENA.

author: Mr Bond
text: White supremacists summoning all the immigrant tethers to undermine foundational black Americans getting the reparations we are owed #fba

author: Black diaspora Voice.
text: Joe Biden gave Ukraine over $100 billion. But will not consider reparations for African-Americans.

author: Carl Benjamin
text: Given that Muslims were the most enduring and prolific slavers in history, perhaps you shouldn't start acting the victim and calling for reparations. Arabia banned slavery in the 60s, the 1960s, and at least the African slaves arrived in the new world with their balls intact. https://twitter.com/QasimRashid/status/1607056811148070913…

author: Time Served Ministry
text: Reparations

author: Marlon Kameka
text:
The only time I will listen to King Charles is if he announces reparations for the enslavement of African people or when the monarchy is abolished. Until then, let's all protest on Saturday 6th May to demand an end to this institution.
#KingsSpeech
#NotMyKing 
#AbolishTheMonarchy
